__e: I, however, will at last be free to unleash my wrath against the one who betrayed me.
What the hell? Am I suddenly a fucking receptacle for every woman who's pissed at a guy?
Spare meself, me ship, me crew but unleash your fury upon those who dare pretend themselves your masters or mine.
God will bring his wrath down upon all of us.
You brought the wrath of good upon us!
Mistress Salling ... I, too, feel angry about the rumors there may be about your daughter.
And now at last I am free from my anger, saved from my nightmares.
So don't come here with your anger, trying to prove something to yourself.
Surely Your Majesty cannot believe the Israelites, that it was a sign of the anger and revenge of their god?
